This is the website for demonstrating how to use the [`scclusteval`](https://github.com/crazyhottommy/scclusteval) R pacakge.

Three datasets are used. Readers can download them at https://osf.io/rfbcg/ and 
follow the analysis in the Rmarkdown files.
